responses: Hello! How can I assist you with HDFC Bank today?
Hi there! What can I do for you?
Our current savings account interest rate is 3.5% per annum.
You can open a new account at the nearest branch or online through our website.

patterns: I want to register a complaint
responses: Please call 1800-270-0000 to register a complaint or use our mobile app.
Thanks for chatting with me. Bye!
